meanings.sent1: The picnic basket was replete with delicious sandwiches and fruits.
meanings.sent2: The library was replete with books on various subjects.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party was replete with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was replete with love for her family.
meanings.sent5: The garden was replete with colorful flowers blooming in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Abundantly supplied or provided with something
meanings.sent1: The buffet was replete with a wide variety of dishes to choose from.
meanings.sent2: The market was replete with fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The treasure chest was replete with shiny gold coins.
meanings.sent4: His mind was replete with creative ideas for the project.
meanings.sent5: The forest was replete with chirping birds and rustling leaves.
